Method Detail

getWidgetFromDOM

public static WrappedWidget getWidgetFromDOM(java.lang.String id)
Wraps the HTML element with the specified ID as a widget. All widgets returned extend Widget and implement the WrappedWidget interface. The following HTML tags are currently supported: a (WHyperlink), div (WPanel), button (WButton), img (WImage). 
 WrappedWidget navLinkSearch = WBuilder.getWidgetFromDOM("nav-link-search");
 
 if (navLinkSearch.isHyperlink()) {
   ((WHyperlink)navLinkSearch).addClickListener(navListener);
 }

Parameters:
id -
Returns:
null if unable to find or build the widget)
